list.title: TkState
list.description: Initializes the TickoSta\te instance

list.title: TkState#get
list.description: Retrieves a property value from localStorage

list.title: TkState#on
list.description: Add an event listener for changes to a specific property or prefix

list.title: TkState#removeEventListener
list.description: Removes an event listener from a specific property or prefix

list.title: TkState#set
list.description: Sets a property value in localStorage and triggers events if the value as changed if value is undefined, removes the property

list.title: module:src/initState
list.description: Handles the initializiation of the state

list.title: module:src/initState
list.description: Initializes the application state

list.title: module:src/initUI
list.description: Handles the initializiation of the app UI

list.title: module:src/initUI
list.description: Initializes the application UI, loading assets fonts and sounds and creating the UI elements based on state

list.title: module:src/initUI~globalThis.tkFocusIndicator
list.description: global focus indicator element

list.title: module:src/main
list.description: Entry point for the whole app

list.title: module:utils
list.description: General utilities

list.title: module:utils.currentFocusElement
list.description: the pixijs element that is currently in focus

list.title: module:utils.focusElement
list.description: Focuses the given pixijs element by setting its isFocused property to true. If a previously focused element exists, sets its isFocused property to false. Moves the focus indicators around the element.

list.title: module:utils.gridToPixel
list.description: Converts a value from grid coordinates to pixel coordinates

list.title: module:utils.pixelToGrid
list.description: Converts a value from pixel coordinates to grid coordinates
